verses.name: Luke 9:47
verses.text: And Jesus, perceiving the thought of their heart, took a child, and set him by him,

verses.name: Luke 9:48
verses.text: And said unto them, Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me: for he that is least among you all, the same shall be great.

verses.name: Luke 9:49
verses.text: And John answered and said, Master, we saw one casting out devils in thy name; and we forbad him, because he followeth not with us.

verses.name: Luke 9:50
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Forbid him not: for he that is not against us is for us.
